body_html:
@Althaire I've removed those conferences 2015 from your profile. Hope it is ok with you :)

@carpodaster @F3PiX I'm not sure, can we close this issue? Was is resolved with this PR #494 ? AFAIU, we still need to remove conferences 2015 manually in cases like this one, right?

body:
@Althaire I've removed those conferences 2015 from your profile. Hope it is ok with you :)

@carpodaster @F3PiX I'm not sure, can we close this issue? Was is resolved with this PR https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/494 ? AFAIU, we still need to remove conferences 2015 manually in cases like this one, right?
